text: Ane jyare te'o para ko'i prakopa avi pahonce to ema kaheta ke he musa (a.Sa.) Amara mate potana palanahara pase a vatani du'a kari apa, jenum vacana tene tamari sathe kari karyum che, jo tame a prakopane amara parathi hatavi apaso to, ame cokkasa tamara kaheva mujaba imana la'i avisum. Ane ame isra'ilana santanane pana (mukta kari) tamane sompi da'isum
